data: {"generalSituation":"A strong easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. Under the influence of a broad band of clouds, there will be one or two rain patches over the region. The northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China over the weekend. It will become appreciably cooler and brighter over the region early next week. With the monsoon being replaced by an easterly airstream gradually in the middle and latter parts of next week, temperatures over Guangdong will rise progressively.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260129","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East force 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches in the morning and at night.
